reviewText: Volume 3 is a must have for Lloyd fans, but it is the least of the 3.  But it still better than almost any comparable comedy collection!  Great shorts (Haunted Spooks is included), & Hot Water is one of the feature films, but Volume #1 has Safety Last, Girl Shy, & Why Worry, & Volume 2 has The Kid Brother, The Freshman, & Grandma's Boy.  Great quality DVD with lots of extras.
Title: The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection Vol. 3

reviewText: It is a MUST to see!!!  Hilarious all the way!!!We think Harold Lloyd is the best of all the comedians.To us 1st. Harold Lloyd, 2nd Buster Keaton, 3rd. Charlie Chaplin and Laurel and Hardy.Cornelia Strohmeier of San Jose, CA
Title: The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection Vol. 3

reviewText: If you like Lloyd, this one is a great collection. The feature films are real silent classics and some of the shortsare very good as well. The quality of the copies is good.
Title: The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection Vol. 3

reviewText: I like this the most of Lloyd's picures . It was fascinating to see "old " New York and Coney Island
Title: The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection Vol. 3

reviewText: Lloyd delights all ages with his antics and cliffhanger comedy. He's one of the greats ever to shine on the silver screen. I enjoy him better than Keaton and Chaplin. Lloyd is in a class by himself.
summary: A Comic Legend at his Best
Title: The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection Vol. 3
